meanings: 대화 시작 Long time no see.
만남 It's been a long time.
대화 시작 It's been a long time.
대화 시작 It's been a long time since I saw you last.

phrases.phrase: 이렇게 유쾌한 영화를 본 건 오랜만이야.
meanings: 영화 I haven't seen anything so pleasant for a long time.
